author: Krassimir Kossev
releaseNotes:
1.0.0 - first version: - reads Power, Energy, Voltage, Amperage once every 60 seconds
1.0.1 - 'amperage' attribute name bug fix; added 'pollingInterval' preference
1.1.1  - added Tuya Outlet TS011F fingerprint.
1.1.2 - added Tuya / Neo NAS-WR01 fingerprint.
1.2.0 - major refactoring and optimizations
1.3.0 - added 'HIKING TOMZN DDS238-2 TS0601', 'AlwaysOn' and 'Optimizations' options
1.4.0 - debug & trace logging cleanup; initialize switch and energy automatic reporting mode; energy and switch are excluded from polling; debug loging is disabled and optimizations are enabled by default; switch digital/physical bug fixed; added driver version check
1.4.2 - missing Switch capability bug fix
